Text_en: Expedition had a get-togerther starting at 8.00 in central park of Espoo. The target was to perform a refreshing three hour wheel dragging exercise. Afther the exercise, the group headed to Mikko's appartment to enjoy one of the most important targets - getting more weight -  in a form of breakfast. After the breakfast, the day was spent on discussing gear and maintenance. During the day, the skies were prepared.
